pages.stepDescription: There should be some stairs in front of you. Go up them.

pages.stepTitle: Go up the small set of stairs
pages.stepDescription: To your right, there should be a few more steps. Go up these: you should see two doors to your left.
Use your ID card on the access point to the right of the door, to unlock them. Go through the doors.
Walk to the door straight ahead of you. You may need to scan your card at this door; the access point will be to your right.
Keep walking straight ahead, until you pass the large window on your left. C117 will be just right of this point.
